targets.expr: sum(nodejs_version_info{app='$app'} or jvm_info{app='$app'} or python_info{app='$app'}) by (version)

panels.description: Numbers fluctuate - Sum of metrics from pods alive at the time. Counters disappear from aggregation when pods are restarted/terminated.
panels.title: WebService Endpoint Requests

targets.expr: jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{gc="PS Scavenge", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^$app.+", kubernetes_namespace=~"^$namespace$"} / jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{gc="PS Scavenge", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^$app.+", kubernetes_namespace=~"^$namespace$"}

jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{gc="PS MarkSweep", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^$app.+", kubernetes_namespace=~"^$namespace$"} / jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{gc="PS MarkSweep", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^$app.+", kubernetes_namespace=~"^$namespace$"}
